name: Strawberry Sorbet
keywords: dessert, lemon juice, orange juice, strawberry
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups sugar, depending on sweetness of berries

recipeInstructions.text: Combine strawberries with sugar and juices in food processor or blender and process until smooth. Add orange liqueur, and taste. Adjust sweetness. Pour into ice-cream freezer and follow manufacturer's directions, or into ice-cube trays (without dividers) or other shallow pans and freeze until partly frozen.
Transfer to large bowl, and beat until mushy. Return to trays, and freeze until firm. Leave in refrigerator about 45 minutes before serving.
